creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: 62 small cups to be hung on a wall as a grouping; each cup is white porcelain with blue at the bottom; cups are cylinder shape with rounded bottom; each cup is torn on one side, with a hole through the torn part; cup hangs by a nail through the hole; in three divided boxes with a bag of 1-1/2" finishing nails used by donors to hang cups
dimension:
1 1/2 × 2 5/8 × 1 3/8 in. (3.8 × 6.7 × 3.5 cm) (object part, each cup, approximate)
44 × 36 × 1 1/2 in. (111.8 × 91.4 × 3.8 cm) (installed, approximate)
signed: two cups are signed in green pencil on the side: Piet Stockmans / 2006
title: Wall Installation No. 2
